data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during LIVERPOOL cruise from St. Johns to Cádiz started at 1768-11-25
Ship: Liverpool (6th Rate Frigate), Voyage: St Johns - Cadiz, 1st Observer: Richard Braithewaite (Captain), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 28G 596BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
